* Ingredients *
 
 * Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil 
 grate. 
 * Whisk egg, salt, and pepper together in a medium 
 bowl. ... 
 * Add ground beef and bread crumbs; mix with your 
 * hands or a fork until well blended. ... 
 * Form into four 3/4-inch-thick patties. ... 
 * Place patties on the preheated grill. ... 
 * Serve hot and enjoy!
